response.overview: "Voice of the wind" (La Voz del Viento) describes a journey made by Carlos and Jean-Luc from Marseille to Granada visiting different projects related to permaculture, thought and action, all focused on a vision of life respect and love. In each of those places, they delivered or exchanged seeds (Jean-Luc has more than 300 varieties) and interviewed some key project people.  This film is open source and can be watched/downloaded for free (English/French/Spanish) in the official website. Donations are more than welcome.
response.tagline: Permaculture, Seeds, Alternative lifestyle, Change for better, Altruism
response.title: The Voice of The Wind
